about_the_game:
*Some tracks are identical to the Digital Mini Soundtrack included in the Digital Deluxe Edition of FINAL FANTASY VII REBIRTH.

*"No Promises to Keep (FINAL FANTASY VII REBIRTH THEME SONG) / LOREN ALLRED" differs from the version released under Sony Music Labels.
